shortdesc.ph: Controls whether to publish the captured local video stream.
Stops or resumes publishing the local video stream.

section.p: This method controls whether to publish the captured local video stream. If you call this method to stop publishing the local video stream, the video capturing device continues to work normally and is not affected. Compared to disabling local video by setting to , this method responds faster.

This method controls whether to publish the local video stream. When you stop publishing the local video stream using this method, the video capturing device continues to work. Compared to disabling local video capture by setting to , which also stops publishing the stream, this method responds faster.

section.title: Timing
section.p: You can call this method before or after joining a channel.
You can call this method before or after joining a channel.

section.title: Related Callbacks
section.p: After this method is successfully called, the local client triggers the callback; the remote client triggers the and callbacks.
After a successful call, the local client triggers the callback; the remote client triggers the and callbacks.

plentry.pd:
Whether to stop publishing the local video stream.
: Stop publishing the local video stream.
: (Default) Publish the local video stream.

Whether to stop publishing the local video stream.
: Stop publishing the local video stream.
: (Default) Publish the local video stream.
